title: How to prove to myself that magic is real - Quora

response.answer_text: You don’t need help from here. If you want to believe it, you will. That’s the position I was in for a while when I was considering myself “in between” religions; I thought spellcasting, ghosts and psionics were real and looked for ‘evidence’ to convince myself. I lost interest in these things after a while and stumbled along the path of debunking or seeing debunked one, then another, then most, paranormal shows, sites, communities or experts I came across. So the trend continued until I realized that none of it was reliable, and now I can tell hocus pocus from reality miles away. This is to put it simply, because I care about truth on principle. But as long as you have an emotional attachment to something not evidently true, you will continue to find what stands for evidence. That’s how belief works: Where there’s a will, there’s a way.

By studying it to understand what it actually is, and then practicing it to see what results you get. Actual proof will take actual learning and testing of what you learned. That’s just the bottom line. That takes time.
Study it! Start with Aleister Crowley’s “Book 4” (all of it), then the rest, study the teachings of the Golden Dawn, and every religion extant. This is a life long endeavor, and well worth it.
Start meditating, reading, and practicing ritual. Very quickly you will find out that it may not be real, but it’s real enough.
If you have a belief in it than it is so Very simple.
